path.description: The path to create the component.

name.x-prompt: What should be the name of the component?

inlineTemplate.description: Specifies if the template will be in the ts file.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

skipTests.description: When true, does not generate a test file.

skipImport.description: Flag to skip the module import.

selector.description: The selector to use for the component.

module.description: Allows specification of the declaring module.

export.description: Specifies if declaring module exports the component.

entryComponent.description: Specifies if the component is an entry component of declaring module.
